summary: This document is an email forwarding Amazon's response to a subpoena for records related to Ghislaine Maxwell. Amazon provided data but redacted titles of expressive materials and noted objections about the volume and burden of the request.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.role: Subject of law enforcement records request
persons.context: The Amazon subpoena and response are related to her case, referenced by external case number 2018R01618.

events.title: Amazon responds to subpoena for Ghislaine Maxwell records
events.description: Amazon's Law Enforcement Response Specialist sent a response with an attached Excel file containing records in response to a subpoena related to Ghislaine Maxwell, but redacted titles of expressive materials and raised objections about the request's volume and burden.

keyFacts: Amazon received and responded to a law enforcement subpoena (Ref. No. CRIM1048721) for records related to Ghislaine Maxwell (External Case No. 2018R01618).
Amazon provided records in an attached Excel file (CRIM1048721_response.xlsx) but redacted the titles of expressive materials for privacy and legal reasons.
Amazon raised objections to the subpoena, stating the request was unusually voluminous and compliance would cause an undue burden.
The communication is dated February 7, 2020, forwarding Amazon's response from January 31, 2020, indicating ongoing investigative activity in early 2020.
